make your brownies you're going to need
some unsweetened cocoa powder some
unsalted butter fine sugar good-quality
dark chocolate eggs and plain or
all-purpose flour start by preheating

or 320 Fahrenheit this is a little lower
than a regular cake temperature I'm

and then add the chocolate but I'm gonna
do microwave method so I'm putting the
butter and the chocolate in together
popping it into the microwave for a
minute at a time stirring in between
until it's beautiful and smooth your
chocolate mixture can just sit off to
the side so it starts to cool down a
little bit and then you want to crack
your three eggs into a mixing bowl
I love cracking eggs then I'm going to
